thread.title: REGION 1D FOOTBALL: Rocky Bond's stock has risen for Eastside this year as he's played off the charts
thread.title_full: REGION 1D FOOTBALL: Rocky Bond's stock has risen for Eastside this year as he's played off the charts

author: TIM HAYES BRISTOL HERALD COURIER
title: REGION 1D FOOTBALL: Rocky Bond's stock has risen for Eastside this year as he's played off the charts
text:
Rocky Bond caught a 36-yard first-quarter touchdown pass from Landon Pannell, while in the second quarter he sprinted to the end zone on a 56-yard TD run during Eastside’s 44-0 season-opening win over Wise County Central on Aug. 28.
